EmailTemplate.subject: Newsletter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
29.01.2015 Welcome to the Inaugural Issue of the Tricentis Partner Newsletter! Subhead is here and about this long We had an incredibly busy and exciting 2014 as we have continued to grow our business and partner network. We are pleased to share with you our recent news and look forward to continuing to drive increased business with you, our partners. If you want to learn more about what we have been up to, or have ideas about how to better partner with Tricentis, feel free to contact us at xxxxx@tricentis.com.
Join our What’s New in Tosca Testsuite Webinar! Tuesday, Feb. 17, 2015, 4:00-5:00 PM CET Register Here <http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-whats-new-in-8-3-service-pack-1-emea.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>. Thursday Feb. 19, 2015, 1:00-2:00 PM AEDT Register Here <http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-whats-new-in-8-3-service-pack-1-apac.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>.
17.02.2015 19.02.2015
The Newest Tosca Testsuite
Subhead Title Goes Here We are happy to announce that the launch of our newest Tosca Testsuite update, the 8.3 Service Pack 1 Release. The release of this newest update introduces exciting new features such as X-Scan, Optical Intelligence, Taas with Web Automation, and much more. More info link <#>
